ctu_text: "}]}, {"type": "paragraph", "children": [{"text": "Different categories of the award are as below:", "bold": true}]}, {"type": "ul_list", "children": [{"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "SUB-1:", "bold": true}, {"text": " Develop a new variety by farmers' own innovative skill in all the main crops of Gujarat like Cereal, Oilseed crop, pulse, cotton, sugarcane, tobacco as well as Horticulture crops and spices and condiments, etc. , and introducing successfully new crops instead of traditional crops grown in the state. "}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "SUB-2:", "bold": true}, {"text": " Achievement in model agriculture by producing higher yield through modern irrigation methods with water management and utilization of irrigation water as well as raising the water table of well/tube well by recharging well/tube well with harvesting rainwater"}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "SUB-3:", "bold": true}, {"text": " Achievement for success in dry farming by developing techniques for drought"}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "SUB-4:", "bold": true}, {"text": " Develop new methods of Integrated Pest Management for different crops"}]}, {"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "SUB-5:", "bold": true}, {"text": " Development of innovative farm equipment for different methods, such as cultivation, inter-cultivation, weeding, spacing, harvesting, threshing, or other types of farming. "}]}]}]}], "benefitTypes": {"id": 3, "value": "composite", "label": "Composite"}, "benefits": [{"type": "ol_list", "children": [{"type": "align_justify", "children": [{"type": "list_item", "children": [{"text": "In this scheme every year \u20b951000/- is awarded with the shawl and certificate to the farmer who gains the first position in each category and also first five farmers from each category are appreciated with the shawl & certificate.
